Flags that specify if the and parameters contain non- values.
The identity of the class of objects to which the new audit rule applies.
The identity of the class of child objects which can inherit the new audit rule.
Docs.summary: Adds an audit rule with the specified settings to the current object. Use this method for directory object Access Control Lists (ACLs) when specifying the object type or the inherited object type for the new audit rule.
Removes the specified audit rule from the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Audit removal is accomplished by using a complex algorithm that might add ACEs in addition to removing them.
